workspace.name: Suppliers
workspace.query: SELECT * FROM SP.PART ORDER By pName LIMIT 100
SELECT sName, pName, color, qty from SP.Supplier s, SP.Part p, SP.Shipment sh WHERE s.sid = sh.sid AND p.pid = sh.pid AND qty > 60 ORDER BY qty LIMIT 10

var op = require("/MarkLogic/optic"); var opxs = op.xs;
op.fromView("SP", "Supplier") .joinInner("SP", "Part", op.on( op.col("sid"), op.col("sid") )) .joinInner("SP", "Shipment", op.on( op.col("pid"), op.col("pid") ) ) .select( ["sName", "pName", "color", "qty"] ) .where( op.gt(op.col("qty"), 60)) .limit(10) .orderBy( op.col("qty")) .result()
